info.description: This API will gives you the ability to manage your orders.
info.title: Marketplaces - Orders

testModeInQueryParameter.description: If true, the operation will be be commited. But the validation will be taken in account.
testModeInQueryParameter.name: testMode

userNameInQueryParameter.description: Sometimes the user in the e-commerce application is not the same than the subscription key you indicate in your settings. We recommand you to indicate the login of the user in your appplication.
userNameInQueryParameter.name: userName

tags.description: All operations related to only one order
tags.name: One Order

tags.description: All batch operations on orders to reduce rate calls
tags.name: Batches

post.description: The purpose of this  operation is to reduce the amount of request to the API.

parameters.name: userName

parameters.description: If true, the operation will be be commited. But the validation will be taken in account.
parameters.name: testMode

parameters.description: The page number you want to get
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: The count of orders exportation you want to get
parameters.name: pageSize

post.description: This will create a file with all your orders related to your filter

parameters.name: format

Indicates the duration to wait in second to be able to make this request again

post.description: The purpose of this API is to reduce the request count.

parameters.description: Indicates that the client accepts that the response will be compressed to reduce traffic size.
parameters.name: Accept-Encoding

BeezUP.Common.Href.description: Indicate the relative uri for this link

BeezUP.Common.HttpMethod.description: Indicate the http method to use on this link

BeezUP.Common.LOVLink2.description: Describe the way you have to follow to get access to the LOV

href.description: Indicate the relative uri pattern to the list of value

listName.description: The name of the list of value

rel.description: Indicate the relation name related to the link
Indicate the relation name related to the link

in.description:
* path: if the parameter must be pass in the path uri
* header: if the parameter must be passed in http header
* query: if the parameter must be passed in querystring
* body: if the paramter must be passed in the body

lovLink.description: This parameter expect the values indicated in this list of values.

lovRequired.description: If true, you MUST use indicate a value from the list of values otherwise it's a freetext

type.description: The value type of the parameter

code.description: the error code. The error code can be a pattern containing the argument's name

cultureName.description: If the error is translated, the culture name will be indicated

message.example: There is already an importation in progress: b24d0dd8-a561-478a-9b26-34f573f03527

value.description: The value of the parameter. Depending to the type.

accountId.description: The marketplace account identifier in BeezUP. This account identifier is based on your api settings.

beezUPOrderStatus.description: BeezUP order status. Unified for all marketplaces.

changeOrderListRequest.description: Contains all change order operations you want to make

changeOrderListRequestItem.description: Contains the order identifier and the change order request

changeOrderReporting.description: The reporting related to a change order operation

creationUtcDate.description: The creation UTC date of the execution

errorMessage.description: The error message during the execution

ipAddress.description: The IP address who request this operation

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update UTC date of the execution

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the execution

changeOrderRequest.description: All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoPosted

dateSearchType.description: Indicates on which date you want to make the filter.

harvestOrderReporting.description: The reporting related to a harvest order operation

beezUPForcedStatus.description: The marketplace order status forced by BeezUP during the order change oepration. This could happend when there is no status on the marketplace side.

creationUtcDate.description: The creation UTC date of the execution

errorMessage.description: The warning message during the execution

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update UTC date of the execution

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the execution

warningMessage.description: The warning message during the execution

marketplaceBusinessCode.description: In an marketplace technical code like CDiscount you can have several marketplaces like GO SPORT, etc. We identify them by a business code.

marketplaceTechnicalCode.description: The technical code of the marketplace.

allOf.description: Describe in details all informations related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails.

order_Buyer_AddressCity.description: The Buyer address city of this order

order_Buyer_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlpha2.description: The Buyer address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Decoding_table for more details)

order_Buyer_AddressLine1.description: The Buyer address line 1 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine2.description: The Buyer address line 2 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine3.description: The Buyer address line 3 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressPostalCode.description: The Buyer address postal code of this order

order_Buyer_AddressStateOrRegion.description: The Buyer address state or region of this order

order_Buyer_Civility.description: The buyer civility for this order

order_Buyer_CompanyName.description: The buyer company name for this order

order_Buyer_Email.description: The email of the buyer for this order

order_Buyer_Identifier.description: The buyer identifier for this order

order_Buyer_MobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the buyer for this order

order_Buyer_Phone.description: The phone number of the buyer for this order

order_Comment.description: The comment associated to this order

order_MarketPlaceChannel.description: Useful to identify the origin of the order. For example in Amazon.

order_OrderItemsSourceUri.description: Technical information: The url to the source of this order items. We received this information from the marketplace.

order_OrderSourceUri.description: Technical information: The url to the source of this order. We received this information from the marketplace.

order_PayingUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the payment of this order

order_PaymentMethod.description: The payment method of this order

order_Shipping_AddressCity.description: The shipping address city of this order

order_Shipping_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlph.description: The shipping address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Decoding_table for more details)

order_Shipping_AddressLine1.description: The shipping address line 1 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine2.description: The shipping address line 2 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine3.description: The shipping address line 3 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressName.description: The name of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_AddressPostalCode.description: The shipping address postal code of this order

order_Shipping_AddressStateOrRegion.description: The shipping address state or region of this order

order_Shipping_Civility.description: The civility of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_CompanyName.description: The company name of the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_EarliestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the earliest ship for this order

order_Shipping_Email.description: The email of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_LatestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the latest ship for this order

order_Shipping_Method.description: The shipping method of this order

order_Shipping_MobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_Phone.description: The phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_Price.description: The shipping price of this order

order_Shipping_ShippingTax.description: The shipping tax for this order

order_TotalCommission.description: The total commission of this order

order_TotalTax.description: The total tax of this order

orderExportationReporting.description: Represent the reporting of the orders exportation.

orderHeader.description: Describe the basic information related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails

eTag.description: ETag value to identify the order. For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

order_LastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by BeezUP of this order.

order_MarketplaceLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by the marketplace on this order.

order_PurchaseUtcDate.description: The purchase date of this order

order_TotalPrice.description: The total price of this order (corresponding to the amount paid by the customer)

orderHistory.description: Describe the history related to an order

changeOrderReportings.description: The list of change order operation

orderItem.description: Describe an order item. All properties with the prefix orderItem_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderItems

beezUPOrderItemId.description: The BeezUP identifier of the order Item

orderItem_BeezUPStoreId.description: The store id in the beezup system related to the order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_ImageUrl.description: The URL of the image of the order item

orderItem_ItemPrice.description: The price of the order item

orderItem_ItemTax.description: The tax of the order item

orderItem_MarketPlaceProductId.description: The marketplace product identifier of the order item

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductId.description: The product id indicated in the catalog importation in BeezUP system for this order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductIdColum.description: The column name for the product id indicated in the catalog importation in BeezUP system related to this order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductUrl.description: The product url indicated in the catalog importation in BeezUP system related to this order item

orderItem_MerchantProductId.description: The merchant product id of the order item

orderItem_MerchantProductIdColumnName.description: The column name indicate in the mapping for the product id related to the order item

orderItem_OrderItemType.description: The order item type of the order item

orderItem_Quantity.description: The quantity of the order item

orderItem_Shipping_Price.description: The shipping price of the order item

orderItem_Title.description: The title of the order item

orderItem_TotalPrice.description: The total price of the order item

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin period you want to make the search. The period MUST not be greater than 30 days. If null, the current date minus 30 days will be used.

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end period of you search. The period MUST not be greater than 30 days. If null the current date will be used.

order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareName.description: The e-commerce software name of the merchant

order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareVersion.description: The e-commece software version of the merchant

pageSize.description: Indicate the order count per page

processing.description: If true, there is currently a harvest or an order change in progress. Otherwise false.

sourceType.description: Indicates the origin of the operation
